spec: Add logging to our app. We want generous INFO based logging in all services. We want 2 different log files (runtime vs test) under backend/logs and backend/logs/test that both rotate daily.
commitMessage:
Added comprehensive logging system with daily rotating files

- Added winston and winston-daily-rotate-file for logging
- Created LoggingModule and LoggingService for centralized logging
- Implemented separate runtime and test log directories
- Added logging to DatabaseService and MonitoringService
- Created logs directory structure
